co.cask.cdap.etl.api

Interface StageMetrics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Metrics

    public interface StageMetrics
extends Metrics
    The interface exposes method for emitting user metrics from ETL stage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void count(String metricName, int delta)
      Increases the value of the specific metric by delta.
      void gauge(String metricName, long value)
      Sets the specific metric to the provided value.
      void pipelineCount(String metricName, int delta)
      Increases the value of the specific metric by delta.
      void pipelineGauge(String metricName, long value)
      Sets the specific metric to the provided value.

    • Method Detail

      • count

        void count(String metricName,
         int delta)
        Increases the value of the specific metric by delta. Metrics name will be prefixed by the stage id, hence it will be aggregated for the current stage.
        Specified by:
        count in interface Metrics
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the counter. Use alphanumeric characters in metric names.
        delta - The value to increase by.

      • gauge

        void gauge(String metricName,
         long value)
        Sets the specific metric to the provided value. Metrics name will be prefixed by the stage id, hence it will be aggregated for the current stage.
        Specified by:
        gauge in interface Metrics
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the counter. Use alphanumeric characters in metric names.
        value - The value to be set.

      • pipelineCount

        void pipelineCount(String metricName,
                 int delta)
        Increases the value of the specific metric by delta. Metrics emitted will be aggregated for the whole ETL pipeline.
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the counter. Use alphanumeric characters in metric names.
        delta - The value to increase by.

      • pipelineGauge

        void pipelineGauge(String metricName,
                 long value)
        Sets the specific metric to the provided value. Metrics emitted will be aggregated for the whole ETL pipeline.
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the counter. Use alphanumeric characters in metric names.
        value - The value to be set.
